ygData.msgSnippet: Wasting no time, Primus teleported Optimus Prime and Skyfire to the Predacon base. Prime wasted no time. Your temporal sabotage days are over Minion. with

Wasting no time, Primus teleported Optimus Prime and
Skyfire to the Predacon base.

Prime wasted no time. 

"Your temporal sabotage days are over Minion." with
that, Optimus brought his laser rod combat deck out of
subspace, pummelling Ragebomber with a barrage of
energy buzzsaws and a hail of missiles from his rapid
fire missile launcher (OOC note: for those who aren't
familiar with G2 but know RiD/Car Robots, his toy form
was recoloured into RiD Scourge/Black Convoy) which
sturck Rageboomber with lethal accuracy. At the same
time, Prime fired blast after blast from his
double-barrelled lser cannon.

It was then that he noticed Sky-Eye.

"SKYFIRE,TAKE OUT THEIR AIR SUPPORT!"

Skyfire immediately transformed and took to the air-
his weapon systems fully powered up and ready for
action.

"You don't have to ask twice."

(OOC: good luck to your minions Airly- you'll need it
:p)
 --- Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote: 
---------------------------------
Chimera heard the order, but something caught his eye
in the sky. 
Panicked, Leo took control and called Hydras.

Chimera: Negatives! NEGATIVES! THE BAD BOTS COME! THEY
WANT TO TEARS 
US AND RIPS US APART, YES! but we won't lets them...
we will Wrench 
their puny bolts out of their circuits... we will
DEVOURS THEM! 
YAARGH!!!!!!!!!!

In beast mode, Chimera took flight and got ready to
welcome the 
Minions as they approached Predacon base.

In vehicle mode, Ragebomber targetted the base and
fired many small 
concussion bombs on it.

Ragebomber: Sky-Eye, dispatch and find Bloodblade!

Immediately, the diminutive Sky-Eye zoomed away and
left the group 
to its dirty work.

Firewhip: Now we get to slay them for good! How I
waited this moment!

The four remaining Minions landed and transformed in
Robot mode, 
Ragebomber a huge and purple Bot, Klash ready to use
his various 
techniques, Crumblefish patiently charging his two
beam weapons and 
Firewhip waiting for the Preds to move...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000"
<airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hdyras,
> 
> Hydras opened his com link to Azure and said "Go to
the base and 
get

after that he 
> opened com link with Chimeara"Chimera, wher're you
???? do 
something 
> useful and move to this cordinates: IF I DON'T SEE
YOU HERE IN FEW 
> CYCLES i'LL PERSONALY KILL YOU!!!"
>

Roared"What are

ARRIVE???? OPEN FIRE 
> AGAINST THOSE PIECE OF METAL!!!!"
> 
> Perceptor
> Received the com link and looking to StarFlier he
said "Proces can 
> continue alone, babe, just keep an eye in him and
told me when 
he's 
> ready to fight"
> 
> PErceptor run the base defences and started to sunk
the base 
inside 
> the volcano. If Asure liked came in he had to be
hurry.
> 
>

and bash some

energon-bloated jewel that 
was

three

> > bases and decided that these were the objectives.
A low roar 
arose

transmitted all over 
the

> >

Transformer on it will

servants. Also, if you 
> > part with the Matrix, I may spare your spark.

turned to his

find, unless they

hint!), left 
on

Firewhip, Klash,

would be there
